channel.title: How do i keep an item in its place when i logg off?
channel.description:
ok... i am new to making a server and i need help.....desperately...!!
1. how can i make an object appear where i am standing.. i need the command to put in like eg:: ::object 1197.
2. how come when i logg off it disappears and how can i sollve this and make it stay on my server......!!
